"Yo, sir. You should take a break.": "But I didn't realize you were so famous. I've heard a lot of rumors about you."
"Don't be so full of yourself. They're just rumors, but a lot of people said I should ask you for advice."
"You're probably not aware of it yourself, sir, but a lot of people think highly of you."
"They may just be rumors, but rumors tend to be exaggerated being passed from person to person."
"For someone who's never met you before, they might mistakenly think you're some kind of super ace, haha."
"Likely to the point of being too hesitant to talk to you."
"I'm glad I got to meet you without hearing anything that would alter my impression of you."
"Though, I'm pretty sure you'd like me better that way."
"Anyways, break's over. See you later, sir."
